pr_title: wiki: Always include item names in widget optarget lookups

timeline.message:
wiki: remove remainder of quest/diary lookup code

2b077f4364b2f45a774a12778bbdd5fc26aab006
wiki: don't throw when trying to optarget skills

timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -114,4 +114,9 @@
 	 * @see ItemComposition#getPrice
 	 */
 	public static final float HIGH_ALCHEMY_MULTIPLIER = .6f;
+
+	/**
+	 * The standard color of items in the right click context menu
+	 */
+	public static final String ITEM_COLOR = "<col=ff9040>";

timeline.message:
wiki: Always include item names in widget optarget lookups

Normally the client includes Widget::name in the target param, but for
widgets that don't normally have menu entries this is often empty so the
lookup string would just be `Lookup `
